name: Exotics
description: Exotics are one the most valuableMineralharvested on Icarus and are a potential reward for completing certainMissions/Operations. They were the reason terraforming failed on Icarus, and now their unique properties are sought after by the variousFactionsseeking to exploit Icarus.
harvested_from: any mission except Potshot: Training; the yield per vein
where they are located vary per mission
